title: Happy Forza Day
description: It's Forza 6 launch day and the the guys are back from Texas.  This week Matt and I attended the Hoonigan Donut Shop opening day, we ponder the differences between ginger based beverages, Matt drives the Sector 111 Drakan, an ATS-V is discussed, Zack entertains with stories of Burning Man, i finished the Fiesta ST build, and Matt reviews the BMW i3.
author: matt@thesmokingtire.com (Matt Farah & Zack Klapman)
content:encoded: It's Forza 6 launch day and the the guys are back from Texas.  This week Matt and I attended the Hoonigan Donut Shop opening day, we ponder the differences between ginger based beverages, Matt drives the Sector 111 Drakan, an ATS-V is discussed, Zack entertains with stories of Burning Man, i finished the Fiesta ST build, and Matt reviews the BMW i3.
